A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I really enjoyed this movie. I'm a long time Star Wars franchise fan and pretty into the \"geek\" culture\, and I thought that this movie fit into the universe perfectly. it was shot beautifully\, there was action\, suspense\, over-arching plot reveals\, and humor. It does run a little long and there's a few scenes worth an eye roll\, but I thoroughly enjoyed it. And its waaaaaaaaay better than any of the prequels so I think the haters should should keep in mind that it could be so\, so much worse.
